formatDescription: The WordPerfect Graphic file format (WPG) is primarily a vector graphic format, but it can store both bitmap and vector data. If you are able to help by supplying any additional information concerning this entry, please return to the main PRONOM page and select ‘Add an Entry’.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: WordPerfect Graphics 2.0
internalSignatures.note: 4 byte magic (-1, 'WPC'), {4 byte offset to document start}, Product type (01 = wordperfect), File type (0x16 = graphic), Major/minor version=0200
